artist: Etcher: Johann Elias Ridinger; Engraver: Martin Elias Ridinger
inscription:
Signature, Title, and Inscription

below image in black: Das Flusspferd und der Löwe / 12 lines in German : Das Flusspferd ... in der That begenen / Joh. El. Ridinger inv. et del.   M. El. Ridinger sculps. Aug (?)  | on sheet in pencil: 2-299
title: The Hippopotamus and the Lion
